name: Endless Swinging Love
description:
GGJ17 presents: a dating sim in Newton's cradle

Did you ever wonder how Newton's Cradle's balls communicate? Do they have to pass messages to each other? What if they want to say something personnal? What if you are the ball on the left and you want to seduce the ball on the right?

In Endless Swinging Love, your date is far from you, and cute but not very careful balls will pass and deform your messages. Meet each ball and get to know them to anticipate their reactions. It's your only way to reach your significant other's heart.

Global Gam Jam entry : http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/endless-swinging-love
